actions.content: Grants 3 Shield points to your active character.

actions.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Weeds
actions.content: Create 1 Dendro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
actions.content: If you have Burning Flame/Dendro Core/Catalyzing Field on the field, deal 1 Pyro DMG/Hydro DMG/Electro DMG to the opposing active character.\n(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Wind and Freedom
actions.content: During this turn, after one of your characters uses a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.\n(You must have at least 2 characters from Mondstadt in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Stone and Contracts
actions.content: When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element and draw 1 card.\n(You must have at least 2 Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Thunder and Eternity
actions.content: Convert all your Elemental Dice to Omni Element.\n(You must have at least 2 Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Nature and Wisdom
actions.content: Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.\n(You must have at least 2 Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Water and Justice
actions.content: Distributes the HP of all your undefeated characters equally, and then heals all of them for 1 HP.\n(You must have at least 2 Fontaine characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
actions.content: Create 2 Omni Element.

actions.name: Changing Shifts
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

actions.name: Toss-Up
actions.content: Select any Elemental Dice to <color=#FFFFFFFF>reroll</color>. Can reroll 2 times.

actions.name: Strategize
actions.content: Draw 2 cards.

actions.name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
actions.content: Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round: Create Omni Element Ã1 and your current active character gains 1 Energy. (Only one copy of I Haven't Lost Yet! can be played each round.)

actions.name: Leave It to Me!
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch will be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>.

actions.name: When the Crane Returned
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you use a Skill:</color> Switch your next character in to be the active character.

actions.name: Starsigns
actions.content: Your current Active Character gains 1 Energy.

actions.name: Calx's Arts
actions.content: Shift 1 Energy from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.

actions.name: Master of Weaponry
actions.content: Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type, and reset the "usages per Round" limit on its effects.

actions.name: Blessing of the Divine Relic's Installation
actions.content: Shift 1 Artifact Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters, and reset the "usages per Round" limit on its effects.

actions.name: Quick Knit
actions.content: Choose one Summon on your side and grant it +1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>.

actions.name: Send Off
actions.content: Choose one Summon on the opposing side and cause it to lose 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>.

actions.name: Guardian's Oath
actions.content: Destroy all Summons. (Affects both you and your opponent!)

actions.name: Abyssal Summons
actions.content: Summon 1 Random Hilichurl Summon!\n(You must have at least 2 Monster characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Fatui Conspiracy
actions.content: Create 1 Fatui Ambusher of a random type on the opponent's field.\n(You must have at least 2 Fatui characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

actions.name: Plunging Strike
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>.

actions.name: Heavy Strike
actions.content: During this round, your current active character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Normal Attack is a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>:</color> Deal +1 additional DMG.

actions.name: The Legend of Vennessa
actions.content: Create 4 basic Elemental Dice of different types.

actions.name: Friendship Eternal
actions.content: Players with less than 4 cards in their hand draw cards until their hand has 4 cards in it.

actions.name: Rhythm of the Great Dream
actions.content: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

actions.name: Where Is the Unseen Razor?
actions.content: Return a Weapon card equipped by your character to your Hand.\nDuring this Round, the next time you play a Weapon card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

actions.name: Pankration!
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when you have at least 8 Elemental Dice remaining, and your opponent has not yet ended their Round:</color> After a player announces the end of their Round first, the other player, who has yet to announce the end of their Round, draws 2 cards.

actions.name: Lyresong
actions.content: Return an Artifact card equipped by your character to your Hand.\nDuring this Round, the next time you play an Artifact card from your hand: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. If you have not played any other Action Cards before playing this card, spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

actions.name: The Boar Princess
actions.content: Each time you discard 1 Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round: Gain 1 Omni Element. (Max 2)\n(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their Weapon, Artifact, or Technique replaced.)

actions.name: Falls and Fortune
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when you have at least 8 Elemental Dice remaining and your opponent has not ended their Round:</color> In this Round, both sides must spend 1 extra Elemental Die when switching characters.

actions.name: Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil
actions.content: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Four-Leaf Sigil</color> to target character: At the End Phase of Every Round, you will switch to this character.

actions.name: Machine Assembly Line
actions.content: Each time after your character is targeted by and takes DMG or is healed: Accumulate 1 point of Battle-Readiness (Max 2 points).\nWhen you play a Weapon or Artifact with an original cost of no more Dice than you have Battle-Readiness points: Clear all Battle-Readiness points and play that card for free.

actions.name: Sunyata Flower
actions.content: Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

actions.name: Controlled Directional Blast
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when there is a total of at least 4 cards in your opponent's Support Zone and Summons Zone:</color> All Summons on both sides lose 1 Usage.

actions.name: Underwater Treasure Hunt
actions.content: Create 6 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Undersea Treasure</color> and place them into your deck at random.

actions.name: Countdown to the Show: 3
actions.content: Convert all your Elemental Dice to Omni Element and draw 4 cards.\nAfter you Discard this card from your Hand or deck: Place 1 "Countdown to the Show" card that costs 1 less Elemental Die than this one on the top of your deck.

actions.name: "I'd Rather Lose Money Myself..."
actions.content: Each time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round, you gain 1 Omni Element. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)

actions.name: Tada!
actions.content: Deal 1 Physical DMG to your active character. Draw 1 card during the End Phase of this Round.

actions.name: Saurian Dining Buddies
actions.content: Select 1 Technique equipped to your characters and increase its Usage(s) by 1.

actions.name: Eremite Teatime
actions.content: If you have multiple characters of the same Elemental Type, then Select 1 Location card from 3 to add to your Hand;\nIf you have multiple characters that use the same type of weapon, then Select 1 Item card from 3 to add to your Hand;\nIf you have characters that belong to the same faction, then Select 1 Food card from 3 to add to your Hand.

actions.name: Ultimate Surfing Buddy!
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when there are at least a total of 2 Summons on the field (Both sides' Summons count):</color> Randomly triggers an End Phase effect of one of your and the opponent's Summons.

actions.name: Abundant Phlogiston
actions.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the next time your character uses Nightsoul points this Round:</color> This character will regain 1 Nightsoul point.

actions.name: Little Tepetlisaur â Treasure Hunter at Large
actions.content: Add 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Abundant Phlogiston</color> cards to both your and your opponent's Decks, after which both of you draw 2 cards.

actions.name: In the Name of the Extreme
actions.content: Exchange Hands with your opponent, then the player with fewer cards in their Hand draws until they have the same number of cards as the other player.

actions.name: Jueyun Guoba
actions.content: During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Adeptus' Temptation
actions.content: During this Round, the target character's next Elemental Burst deals +3 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
actions.content: During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
actions.content: During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Sweet Madame
actions.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
actions.content: Heal the target character for 2 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Mushroom Pizza
actions.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Minty Meat Rolls
actions.content: Before this Round ends, the target character's next 3 Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
actions.content: Revives the target character and heals that character for 1 HP.\n(You can only revive 1 character via Food per Round, and a character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Sashimi Platter
actions.content: Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
actions.content: During this Round, all your characters' next Elemental Skills deal +2 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Butter Crab
actions.content: During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Fish and Chips
actions.content: During this Round, all your characters will use 1 less Elemental Die when using their Skill next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
actions.content: Heal the target character for 2 HP. For the next 3 Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again during the End Phase.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Rainbow Macarons
actions.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP. The next 3 times this character takes DMG, they will also heal 1 HP afterward.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Saurus Crackers
actions.content: During this Round, the target character will use 1 less Elemental Die the next time they use a Technique.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Glittering Gemstones
actions.content: The target character gains 1 additional Max HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Puff Pops
actions.content: The next 3 times a card whose name was not in your initial deck is added to your Hand, heal your target character for 1 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Hot Spring O'Clock
actions.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP and 1 additional HP for each Summon on your field.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

actions.name: Mystique Soup
actions.content: Select 1 of 3 random effects to be performed on the target character.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
